description: Awaken your natural, innate healing potential with homeopathic treatment for living and dying - guidance in death care, meditation, movement, breathing and sound.
cleaned_text: Living and Dying in Harmony Sound Homeopathy is dedicated to awakening your natural, innate healing potential with homeopathy, natural medicine for living and dying and guidance in meditation, movement, breathing and sound. Specializing in wellness for Boomers, to support living with vitality and compassionate death care.
